RelatedSentence: Just as the lock down from last week 's assault on a correctional officer was to be lifted , another staff member was assaulted by an offender at Iowa State Penitentiary today .
At approximately 7:15 a.m. today an ISP staff member gave a group of offenders a directive to move away from a restricted and off limits yard area .
One offender began to argue with the staff member which resulted in the offender 's assault on staff .
The staff member who was assaulted sustained bruises to his face and head during the incident .
